titleStmt.title: An alphabet of elegiack groans, upon the truly lamented death of that rare exemplar of youthful piety, John Fortescue, of the Inner-Temple, esquire / By E.E.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Heath, in Russel-street near the Piazza's of Covent-Garden.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "August 6"; the 4 in imprint date has been altered to 6.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Russel-street near the Piazza's of Covent-Garden.
